SELECT A.UPPR_CODE , A.UPPR_CODE_NAME , A.CONFIG_YN , A.INPUT_YN , A.USE_YN From UPPR_CODE A WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.UPPR_CODE_NAME LIKE '%' + #{upperCodeName} + '%'
AND A.INPUT_YN = #{inputYn}
ORDER BY A.UPPR_CODE
SELECT A.CODE , A.CODE_NAME , A.VAL1 , A.VAL2 , A.VAL3 , A.SORT_NO , A.USE_YN FROM V_CODE A WHERE A.UPPR_CODE = #{upprCode} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.SORT_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM CODE A WHERE A.UPPR_CODE = #{upprCode}
